anything about it, you’re definitely, in

2936.text:
my view, I use the expression on the bus to
pity city. It’s not going to get you anywhere,

2939.text:
you’re really not. So what could you do
about it? And then the final one by way of

2945.text:
example, and this is a bit like act as if:
what would X do? So there will be people in

2949.text:
our lives that inspire us. There will be people
in our lives that we admire. There will be

2954.text:
people in our lives that possess, perhaps,
a skill or a behaviour that we think I’d

2959.text:
really like to be able to do that, certainly
to a better level than I can today.

2965.text:
So what would they do in response to this
situation? And again you can get into that

2972.text:
mindset. You could even, in preparation in
terms of being proactive, take a few moments

2978.text:
to write down what, if they’re a celebrity
or a business leader that’s got stuff on

2983.text:
YouTube, watch them, analyse them, write down
what are their skills and characteristics.

2988.text:
Remind yourself about that when you’re going
into a difficult situation, so how do I want

2991.text:
to be? How do I want to sit? How do I want
to speak? All of those things when you bring

2996.text:
them together will definitely increase your
ability to make that journey from adversity

3003.text:
back up to being somebody how you want to
operate.

3007.text:
So I’m going to end with two quotes, quite
different. This is the first. Long, so I’ll

3013.text:
give people a moment to read it. So here’s
a guy who, if you were to ask most people

3025.text:
to talk about Michael Jordan, would talk about
all of his successes. What we see here is

3031.text:
an individual who has been down lots. He’s
worked incredibly hard. He’s had lots of

3037.text:
failures, and in his view, in his view that’s
why he’s successful. So move on to the final

3043.text:
quote, Confucius. And this is really it for
me. So it’s not about avoiding things and

3050.text:
never being failing and never being a point
where we go to achieve something and stretch

3056.text:
for something and it doesn’t quite work
out; it’s really about our ability to pick

3060.text:
ourselves up, dust ourselves down, and carry
on.
